title: Tree Lord's Oracle
description: --Inspirational Fantasy Romance Novella--Arekel becomes the chosen of her world to stop the Tree Lord menace from expanding his domain of Deadwood. Embarking on the fretful task, the young maiden learns that she alone holds the key to destroying the Tree Lord’s malevolent heart. There’s just one other problem. She’s fallen in love with him.
author: Tessa Stockton
